body:
Comment 2: 
The error you're showing is not an error in gopack: it is in 6g.
Relevant lines:

6g(27929) malloc: *** mmap(size=18446744071562067968) failed (error code=12)
*** error: can't allocate region
*** set a breakpoint in malloc_error_break to debug
_testmain.go:3: internal compiler error: fault

Can you try to cut down file.go to see what's causing the bug?
_Labels changed: removed **gopack**._ _Owner changed to **r...@golang.org**._ _Status changed to **WaitingForReply**._
